channel.title: North Coast on Gerard McGarry
channel.description: Recent content in North Coast on Gerard McGarry

item.title: Cutting Turf
item.description: Like many working class families, we used to cut turf for our fires in the winter. A visit to an old peat bog brings back some childhood memories…

item.title: Northern Ireland North Coast Photos 2021
item.description: A collection of Instagram shots from drives around the North Coast of Northern Ireland in 2021
